Title: Ulee's Gold
Cast: Peter Fonda, Patricia Richardson, Christine Dunford, Tom Wood, Jessica Biel, Vanessa Zima, Steven Flynn, Dewey Weber, J. Kenneth Campbell, Traber Burns, Ryan Marshall, Chad Fish, Will Sexton, Dale C. Marshall, James T. Whitehurst
Plot: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts. Ulee is called one day by his incarcerated son, Jimmy, asking for a favor. Jimmy will repay his debts if they save his wife, Helen, from hoodlums. Ulee must now risk his and his family's lives to save Helen. Written by Robert Krzanowski <stonedpsycho@hotmail.com>
Keywords: beekeeper, dysfunctional family, tied to a chair, man with glasses, bound and gagged
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 15 nominations.
Actors: Peter Fonda, Patricia Richardson, Christine Dunford
Description: Directed by Victor Nunez.  With Peter Fonda, Patricia Richardson, Christine Dunford, Tom Wood. A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.
